website_summaries.verdict: Iconic and recognizable Club steering wheel lock. Fits a variety of vehicles and steering wheel sizes.
pros: Still the standard in steering wheel locks
One-motion locking without the need for a key is convenient
Solid construction adds peace of mind

customer_reviews.title: Lock is easily drillable. Does not prevent theft!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to deter theives from my car. It did not work, they drilled out the lock & were able to just push the lever inside to unlock. The lock was very easily broken, they almost took off with my car but it requires a chip to start. DO NOT BUY! IT’S GARBAGE!
customer_reviews.author: CokePokes

customer_reviews.title: Had to call a locksmith to remove it after using it only 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: After using it about 6 weeks, it got stuck on my steering wheel. The keys couldn't unlock it. I followed the tips on the website for getting it unstuck. I finally had to call a locksmith. He tried to pick the lock, to no avail. So he bent the Club so he could remove it. I'm under the 90-day warranty but the company doesn't offer refunds, just another Club.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: This thing doesn't work. I had it for less ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing doesn't work. I had it for less than 3 weeks and it's already giving up on me. The metal rod just won't lock in the sheath anymore.
customer_reviews.author: derekdb

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work, car was stolen with steering wheel lock on
customer_reviews.text: Bought this lock on based on good reviews here. Easy to put on the car, no problem with that. What happened was.. the car was stolen even with this steering wheel lock on. They were able to cut the metal part. So there it goes.. they’re getting smarter these days. So even with this on, still possible to get a car stolen. Just a heads up to future buyers or the ones who own it. Take extra precautions when it comes to safety in your neighborhood. This will not be enough to stop thieves.
customer_reviews.author: AC M.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted on car less than one day before the kid sawed through it.
customer_reviews.text: 25 year old with a suspended license sawed through it the first day I put it on. Not very impressed. I guess as a visual deterrent it's good, but if my knucklehead kid could get it off that fast, I highly doubt that professional car thieves would be discouraged. It is "heavy duty" looking and feeling though.
customer_reviews.author: David Booth

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Failed after third use. Will not lock into place replaced with other mfg.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A daily reminder that your city sucks
customer_reviews.text: I park 2 cars on the street i a major city. This gives me the piece of mind to know that if a car gets stolen, it will most likely be someones else's ;) Goes on and off easily with the key and secures well to my steering wheel. Only downside to using the club is that you have to remind yourself of the screwed up community you live in where you have to put on extra security measures to make sure someone doesn't steal your car.
customer_reviews.author: B. sindelar

customer_reviews.title: It's a great tool as long as you don't expect it to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a capable high profile anti theft device. I put it in my classic/antique pickup truck for added security along with wing window locks. It's a great tool as long as you don't expect it to work miracles. Mine functions flawlessly unlike some of the reviews I have read. I recommend using it in conjunction with other anti theft devices for older vehicles. I wouldn't hesitate to buy another one in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mercury

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and visually appealing.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my blue Yukon. Love the look and feel; doesn't feel tacky like some of those neon-bright wheel locks, but still sturdy and noticeable when applied. Only minor comment: the packaging on this thing sucks. I actually ended up scraping up the rubber coating on it with scissors as I was frantically trying to pry it open. So use caution when getting it out for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Thieves should burn in Hell (get a real job!)
customer_reviews.text: I will use this to Club the next person who tries to steal my car (we just had a Honda Civic stolen). I hope this device helps slow down/deter the next amateur until I can come out and taze them repeatedly as I await the arrival of the cops!
customer_reviews.author: PAVB

customer_reviews.title: Commanding performer!
customer_reviews.text: No better product for its price and simplicity of use. Just a note for potential buyers, it will automatically lock without the key when extended, a brilliant convenience when you are locking up. Upon unlocking, you must turn the key a certain way to remove it. But that extra step puts the Club in the automatic lock readiness when you extend it. If there is a downside, it'll be its weigh which probably a characteristic of its high quality and purposeful protection feature.
customer_reviews.author: Kalihiboy

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Secure
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and easy on the mind. Twist the steering wheel to lock position, put on the Club in extended position, and walk away feeling relieved that there is something there to deter theft. It would also be great to have a tracking mechanism but that's more money with more complications. The Club is a good start.
customer_reviews.author: David Roderick

customer_reviews.title: and it's easy enough to put on and take off
customer_reviews.text: I use this every weekday at the park and ride. My car has not been stolen yet, so I can't testify one way or the other about the effectiveness of the product. I think it's a decent deterrent though, and it's easy enough to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa L.

customer_reviews.title: A long lasting quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Skeptical about how effective this product is from reading other reviews but it could be that the would be thieves are leaving bad reviews for the fact it works??? I purchased this product regardless of reviews in hopes that if anything, it will slow or discourage a thief giving me time to be alerted to their efforts. After installing a few times, I found it is somewhat cumbersome getting on the wheel in the recommended configuration. The product is durable and hardened steel. I do get a sense of satisfaction knowing it is one more obstacle to overcome should someone try to steal my 85 Heavy Chevy Silverado 4X4!
customer_reviews.author: Augie

customer_reviews.title: The product is extremely sturdy and durable I know its gonna be with me ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a little rocky at first, in the sense that I had no clear knowledge of how it actually had to be set the correct way. Because the tiny image on the packaging is very limited. The product is extremely sturdy and durable I know its gonna be with me for a long long time. Its very pretty too if youre a girl with a weekness for car stuff likegadgets and gizmos.
customer_reviews.author: M.G

customer_reviews.title: Don’t lose the keys!!
customer_reviews.text: Well, it’s not electronic abd it won’t annoy the neighborhood. Good old fashioned steel that will deter theft simply because it takes time and the proper tools to defeat it. It takes a bit of use to set in place quickly, but easy once you learn how. ALWAYS INSTALL ON THE BACK SIDE OF THE WHEEL because it’s even more awkward for thieves. Highly suggested to keep wandering family members from “ borrowing “ it
customer_reviews.author: RareMettle

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have an older model car that is often the target of thieves so I bought this club. I lost my indoor parking at my workplace so I now park on the street and wanted to have some theft protection. It's super easy to use. You can put it on without using the key, then taking it off you unlock it and pop it off.
customer_reviews.author: seattlitte

customer_reviews.title: Slight discoloration, but who cares at this price
customer_reviews.text: The white letters are slightly discolored, but for the price that is much lower than Winner’s site lists it for, it’s worth it. I don’t care what color it is as long as it works. Which it has been doing just fine for about a week now. I’ll try to remember to update this later after using it a while longer. It’s heavy and fairly simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: hapa

customer_reviews.title: No refund if they steal your car
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son. Thieves stole his car...yes, with this on it. The car was recovered, steering wheel cut. Be aware this is only a visual deterrent. If you have a desirable car, install a kill switch. Do no rely on one of these to put off serious car thieves. The product was easily thwarted. And they wouldn't even refund the purchase price of the Club, in fact simply "ghosted" him when he inquired.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce U.

customer_reviews.title: Old tech,  best tech.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a result of my 20 year old car being stolen. (Then recovered) So far no attempted breakins after purchase, seems to discourage car thieves, as removing the club would require large cumbersome tools and muscle. Added to this thief discourager, is my anti-millennial theft device (aka Manual transmission), hopefully will ward off all but the most persistent criminals.
customer_reviews.author: TikiTumbwo

customer_reviews.title: Your Car can Get Stolen
customer_reviews.text: This is more a Visual Deterrent. The Club has been proven to have flaws including the locking mechanism being picked and the sawing of the steering wheel YouTube Videos. It’s nice to have something instead of nothing. Do I feel like my Car Can be stolen with The Club? Yes A Theif will have to work a little harder and take more time which increases the chances of getting caught or just saying “Ah forgettabout it”.
customer_reviews.author: Rasuel

customer_reviews.title: Consider your options
customer_reviews.text: It’s just OK. If you have a 3 spoke steering like mine then you’ll have to get creative with placement. I don’t like that it doesn’t feel tight on my steering wheel. Obviously it doesn’t move but it still has a little wiggle to it. My placement is straight across, which is fine but I feel like defeats the purpose to some extent.
customer_reviews.author: William Atmur

customer_reviews.title: Going back to old school theft deterrent
customer_reviews.text: Sadly where I live, the hoodlums are coming in and breaking into cars and sometimes stealing them. I decided to go back to "old school" and get these Clubs for the 2 vehicles we park outside. Figured the younger thieves wouldn't know what they were or what to do, and they would move on. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: The Senator

customer_reviews.title: Good Protection
customer_reviews.text: This product is good. I am satisfied with my purchase. I use it on my Subaru Forrester every day. I recommend this product if you're looking for piece of a mind for the safety of your vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Ody

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised. A great deterrent.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and take off. In my Toyota Tacoma, you can turn it around to make it more difficult to get at the key-hole so they can't try to freeze it. It's heavy, a great way to deter thieves. They'll just look for another vehicle without such a visible deterrent. This is a replacement because I gave my original one to my wife who had her car stolen but got it back.
customer_reviews.author: John Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I don't even know what to put with this one the whole thing came out of the socket. Looks used to me a few scratches here and this is not good I wouldn't recommend this to anyone. I'm sorry I bought this should have bought it from another seller or another type
customer_reviews.author: Shanelle

customer_reviews.title: The Club, sturdy & quality manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: I've had 4 steering wheel locks, Fortress and now The Club. I really like The Club because of ease of contacting the company for support such as lost key replacement. Company website by far exceeds The Fortress, I yet to have found a source of support from that company... I do wish they'd offer a true high security lock for these (like a Medico lock). These would be very easy to pick.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Huddleston

customer_reviews.title: Don't let this happen to you!
customer_reviews.text: After using the product sporadically for the past 2 months, suddenly neither of the two keys that would open the lock would do that. Our car was locked in place! I read online for help and saw reviews from the past of similar thing happening to other people. And, for them at least, WD-40 did not solve the dilemma. WD-40 saved us this morning, but I am not going to continue using this club. This never happened when we owned a Club in the late 1980s. Maybe a change in manufacturer since then.....
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Manahan

customer_reviews.title: The Club
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend whose car was recently stolen because she foolishly left the doors unlocked. Had she had the club on her steering wheel, they would not have been able to drive off in her vehicle. My husband and I each have one on our cars and people laugh at us because they feel it's so old fashioned. I ask them, "Are you going to pay for our cars if they get stolen?" That always shuts them right up!!
customer_reviews.author: DeeBee

customer_reviews.title: Not gonna take my ride!
customer_reviews.text: I don't expect to ever have a problem in my neighborhood, but you never know. I got this as a backup security feature on my dream car. It's a high quality product that gives me the extra peace of mind I need to sleep at night. Don't think twice, order it now =)
customer_reviews.author: Sienna Grace

customer_reviews.title: I know they work but mine is too gross to install
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t come in the color I ordered and it was really greasy almost all over when I took it out of the packaging. The keys absolutely REEK. Maybe I’m just sensitive to certain smells but the keys smelled so bad that I haven’t installed the device in my car because I don’t want the keys to stink up everything in my pockets. I know these bad boys are reliable because my friend uses one, which is why I rated it accordingly. Solid product, maybe don’t buy if you’re obsessive compulsive about smells. Idk maybe I just got one from a bad batch. They do work though! Excellent deterrent, needs some detergent
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: I got this originally because my girlfriend has one and I needed one as well and thought it was pretty good quality steering wheel lock. When I got mines, both keys that came with it did not fit so I had to return it. If I did not see my girlfriend's steering wheel lock, I probably would have gave it 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Same trusted club
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly as they have over decades. Not five stars because the rubber stains the leather steering wheel. Have to use a microfiber towel to protect the steering wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Parent

customer_reviews.title: wow! what a bargain. so well made!
customer_reviews.text: does what it says it will do. so well made. no weird odor. the only thing that sucks about the club is not the product at all. what sucks is their "mail in" warranty forum. they ought to be ashamed of their mail in forum. get out your magnifying glass. honestly...its so well made...you have zero to worry about. good lock!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal! I love it! Allows me to sleep at night, While owning a Honda. Haha! It's easy to install, Easy to remove when needed. Very High quality, This bar isn't going anywhere, The key and lock seems solid, I don't feel like it's going to get stuck or break.
customer_reviews.author: GreenCowLand

customer_reviews.title: Keeps honest people honest.
customer_reviews.text: Just bear in mind that these only slow down the thief. A good visual deterrent to some but a person with tools has them off in 15 seconds; look on YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Glass

customer_reviews.title: Indispensible
customer_reviews.text: As many reviewers have said this will not prevent a car thief from stealing a car but may slow them down or encourage them to look for an easier target. I use it every time I get out of my car including my home garage. Very easy to apply to the steering wheel and very easy to remove. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: A little more peace of mind!
customer_reviews.text: I have an old Civic which was stolen for a joy ride awhile back. After it was located, still in good condition in nearby state I decided to buy a club and this one was the best reviewed. It's really easy to put on and take off and I use it every day. I'm a older woman and it isn't too heavy or awkward for me to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B

customer_reviews.title: I am unable to unlock the club, a brand new purchase. I am unable to use my car.
customer_reviews.text: Here's my review: I purchased this on Oct 10. Yesterday I went out to my car, the club CANNOT be unlocked. I found the duplicate key - the club CANNOT be unlocked. I have no access to my car. Am I supposed to pay a locksmith to take it off? I have an unusable car. What now? What a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Susan G. Karl

customer_reviews.title: Going strong after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I've had this Club for about a year now, and it's still working great. I use it in my van, which is right hand drive. It gives me peace of mind that my van, which doesn't have an alarm, at least has an extra layer of protection with the Club.
customer_reviews.author: Roo

customer_reviews.title: Not Like They Used To
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a couple months. Then, as others have stated, the locking mechanism stopped working. I can see the catch not working when looking down into it after removing the top section. I've had 2 of these in the past with no issue. One was given away and one was in a car accident and I couldn't manage to get it unstuck from the car. Never had a problem. Guess they don't make them like they used to.
customer_reviews.author: smm

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Cent.
customer_reviews.text: This Club is such an improvement over the plain red one. It easily locks into place on the steering wheel without the need for a key. The key is only used to unlock the club. Works smoothly and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Gwenn Musicante

customer_reviews.title: What is this? Only had The Club for six months!
customer_reviews.text: Records show I received THE CLUB on January 24 2020. I use it MOST days. Today this piece of metal popped off onto the dash of my pickup. I can't imagine what it is even FOR! It has a spring there. See the photo I uploaded. So will The Club no longer offer security? It just seems SO stupid! In fact, it NO LONGER works without this part. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: c d Land

customer_reviews.title: Great Steering Wheel Lock
customer_reviews.text: Can’t go wrong with purchasing the original “Club” steering wheel lock to secure your car and deter thieves. Very simple to use and feels very durable. It brings peace of mind knowing it is locked onto the car steering wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Wong

customer_reviews.title: Works bur could be better built
customer_reviews.text: I own several of these starting back 30 years - this is the most flimsy one that I have. I felt that I could bend this off the steering wheel if I wanted to.... but it will stop most and slow others
customer_reviews.author: dralexy

customer_reviews.title: Keeps car thieves at bay
customer_reviews.text: Keeps car thieves at bay. After a family car was stolen, and then recovered recently, I bought a couple of these for the cars. Are solid, and a visual deterrent for a would-be thief. I know that there’s probably a way to break this and steal the car, but just the thought of giving a thief aggravation over it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Bohemian

customer_reviews.title: The club, beats crime but you can’t get beat on price !!
customer_reviews.text: I had a club for like 15 years. No issues until one day I pulled it apart too far and it would not go back together. Not bad. I bought another and hope to get another 15. Great simple product that works.
customer_reviews.author: Valentina

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive Auto Security
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy construction but, as might be expected, a bit awkward to handle. Rather tight fit in our '15 Mustang but not impossible once you figure out the correct way to attach to the steering wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Rangers Fan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Club product
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and sturdy. Key and lock work easily. Used for 3 months now, easy to use. Great price also.
customer_reviews.author: RJN

customer_reviews.title: Safe and sound!
customer_reviews.text: I remember my Mother would use this on her mini van growing up, after my car was stolen I would not take any more chances so I turned to the club and now I can feel a sense of ease that someone isnt stealing my car.
customer_reviews.author: Vincenzo

customer_reviews.title: Club Stops Thieves
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my son who had his car stolen twice in two weeks. The second time he didn't get it back for a couple of months. So far, the Club seems to be doing its job...the car's where he parks it every time he returns...fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: paula karlberg

customer_reviews.title: Just like the original
customer_reviews.text: Giving 4 stars because I bought it as a gift and have not used it myself but I did inspected upon arrival and it looks and appears to be just like the original item which has been around for decades
customer_reviews.author: Lyndi

customer_reviews.title: Great deterrence.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, locks the wheel and even get a discount on my insurance on the cars. Pays for itself after first 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Blitz Krieg

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: I guess it does the job, just seems a little flimsy after taking it out of the package. I bought it because I wasn’t sure I had the key for my previous one, which was great. Turns out my previous one was actually made by Master. And I found the key. I’ll give it as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: user 313

customer_reviews.title: No ones stolen my car yet!
customer_reviews.text: I am forced to park my car on the street in a neighborhood that has some car theft activity. Just the other night someone in the neighborhood broke into a car and destroyed the key ignition area trying to hot wire before stealing it. I like to think that the club is at least a good deterrent and they might move on to an easier target.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: it's hard to say if this product works well because what it works your car doesn't get stolen so so far my car hasn't been stolen it has been rated number one internationally
customer_reviews.author: d morgan

customer_reviews.title: works for what i use it for
customer_reviews.text: works great as a deterrent. If someone wants to steal your car all they really have to do is take a hacksaw to your steering wheel if ya have this on it. but hey, whose gonna go through that much trouble for an older car. it's just for looks for me.
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: Give this a try!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Dodge PU, Easy to put on as well as to remove, I do have an alarm but this adds to my security.
customer_reviews.author: Dobie

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Read some negative reviews, but so far this is working fine. If it falls apart or gets stuck, I'll rewrite my review...
customer_reviews.author: "G"

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best. Don't bother with the cheaper knock-off types. The price is great ...definitely "looks" it's part and the color makes the club stand out when bad guys might be peering in the window. Of course from what I've read, it doesn't deter professionals but does the punks... which is a very good thing.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: It fully extends by way of gravity when not in use.
customer_reviews.text: When not in use, the inside bar can slide out full length and locks in place very quickly requiring the key to adjust it back again. I learned this is a very good safety feature and am no longer annoyed!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: The Club Rules
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so these have been around for years but I finally bought one. I really enjoy having the peace of mind of leaving my car with "The Club" in place. I sometimes have to leave my dogs in the car with it running so the AC or heater can be on. I no longer worry about my car disappearing because someone broke in and drove off.
customer_reviews.author: peacecliff

customer_reviews.title: Very happy! Well made
customer_reviews.text: Very happy! Well made. Great fit and finish. Works well on my 2018 Kona. May not be as rugged as the 4 hook type, but fits my steering wheel a lot better. The 4 hook type was a poor fit and bulky on the particular steering wheel.
customer_reviews.author: FI11

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and effective.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install on a steering wheel. Is rubber at the contact points, so it doesn't mar anything. It's heavy and beefy. Is easy to install and remove. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Just meant to be a deterrent for car thieves. ...
customer_reviews.text: Just meant to be a deterrent for car thieves. I know it's not a guarantee. Operates smoothly and came with two keys in case I lose mine. =)
customer_reviews.author: Tech Director

customer_reviews.title: Effective and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I had one growing up and never understood but car theft is really bad in the neighboorhood and this works like a charm it's seriously so tough I'm surprised everyone doesn't have one for their car. would definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: cherryblossom11

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to attach
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to attach. Won't deter professional thief with bolt cutters who really wants your particular car, but will deter opportunists.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A MUST for ever City Dweller!
customer_reviews.text: I live in the City and will NOT park my car without using my Club! It's easy to put on my steering wheel and will deter a common thief from attempting to steal what isn't theirs!
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: The Club..
customer_reviews.text: Just put it on your steering wheel.Its easy to do and keeps your mind free of worry about your vehicle from getting stolen. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: localwahine808

customer_reviews.title: Excelente Extra Security.
customer_reviews.text: I like that this device makes the lazy thief move on to an unsecured vehicle, a great deterrent!
customer_reviews.author: Missionary Frank

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color but item good
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good product but i ordered a red one to go with my dads red car , but received a blue one. Dad didn’t want to bother returning it so we kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: the locking feature is different than the original, starting to like it more. The unit is always in lock mode, slide into place it automatically locks.
customer_reviews.author: bugiun

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately this device is not going to stop a thief ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this device is not going to stop a thief from stealing your car. It is merely a delay for the thief. I look at it this way, if there is more than one Honda Civic in the parking lot. The thief is going to take the path of least resistance and steal the Honda without the "club". It only takes a thief an extra minute to cut the steering wheel and remove the club.
customer_reviews.author: Peachy

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: It's a little awkward to get on until you get used to it. My truck got stolen last year and I believe this will help keep it in the garage in the future.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Safety first.
customer_reviews.text: I use this at work. I like the fact that it is highly visible. Easy to install and remove.
customer_reviews.author: Lottie Ringle

customer_reviews.title: Strong, bright, reliable
customer_reviews.text: This is THE standard. Does what it needs to do. Solid, visible, dependable. Too bad we even need these things, but it works without any fancy and unreliable technology.
customer_reviews.author: Luann

customer_reviews.title: club
customer_reviews.text: received as listed AAA everybody should use one on there cars
customer_reviews.author: dave b.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Solid
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to complain about here. The product is simple and feels very durable. The lock operates very smooth and has never gotten stuck or failed to lock.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to depoly and remove!!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to attach and remove with key. We love how quick it is to attach and remove. Now there is no reason not to put it on our vehicles. Granted, it is not 100 percent theft proof, but I think most criminals will look to the quick and easy theft, as opposed to using a saw to cut through your steering wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Arrow Flight

customer_reviews.title: The red club
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived on time and is as pictured. I like the Club. It's a good size and thickness. I like the red color to make it stand out in my car. The weight is good. It gives me more secure feeling knowing it's on my steering wheel to detour theft.
customer_reviews.author: Jeane

customer_reviews.title: Blah
customer_reviews.text: Seems very light for a regular club. My last one was way heavier. This one seems like a cheap imitation. And it’s hard to remove as it doesn’t easily open and close.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Good solution
customer_reviews.text: Our car has been stolen twice, so we are clubbing it! A good deterrent!
customer_reviews.author: tara croft

customer_reviews.title: It will not fit tight on my steering wheel
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2018 dodge challenger. It doesn’t fix tight on my steering wheel. I can easily move it. I’m sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Tanaya

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the Club!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th Club that I have purchased and I still have them all. This one was purchased for my daughter's Jeep and she loves the color as well as the Club's purpose---protecting her Jeep. I would recommend the Club to anyone who wishes to have additional security.
customer_reviews.author: B. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Hey. It's The Club. Car theft is crazy ...
customer_reviews.text: Hey. It's The Club. Car theft is crazy in my town and in my daughter's. I had my dad's old one, and bought this for her. Is it fool proof? Nothing is. But it is one more thing the idiots have to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: C. G. Persson

customer_reviews.title: You can’t beat a Club for securing your car. ...
customer_reviews.text: You can’t beat a Club for securing your car. Just the look of it on your steering wheel is enough to make someone go somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked once, no longer locks
customer_reviews.text: It seemed fine at first, it's pretty solid. I left it locked on the steering wheel for a month while I worked on my recovered stolen car. Took it off to drive today and nothing in this world will make it work again when I wanted to put it back on. Over $40 for one use. This is total garbage, do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Miller

customer_reviews.title: Still good
customer_reviews.text: Not as heavy as they used to be and the lock is not as complex so easier to pick but still well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Kerbow

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Just pull sideways to lock it to the steering wheel. Twist of the key to unlock. The long end has to be facing the middle of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Owen

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: I've been using The Club since I got it last October on my 2017 Prius, and it's done what it's supposed to do. I haven't had any problems locking it or unlocking it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Keys didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Got stuck on my steering and the key didn’t work, called Amazon and they were no help, had to spend my own money to call a locksmith.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great easy to use. Haven’t had any issues as I’ve read some people wheel lock gets jammed but mine has been a breeze. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Malika Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Feel like my Car is protected when the Club is on!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Steering wheel can still be moved
customer_reviews.text: Any product of this type is more of a deterrent and will not prevent a thief or malicious person from driving off with your vehicle. Your vehicle can actually be started and driven for a short distance or as long as no turns are involved.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I still have my car
customer_reviews.text: I bought The Club almost 2 years ago after a freind of mine had his car stolen from a trailhead while rock climbing in the Cascades. This has happened a few times at recreational areas around here. I didn't want to get stranded, and figured if I had The Club, theives would move on from my car to an easier mark in the parking lot. I only really use it when I park at trailheads or in unfamiliar neigborhoods. Is The Club effective? Who can say. But it's easy to use, and 2 years later, I still have my car.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy produdt with high visibility.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy product with high visibility. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Upperpark23

customer_reviews.title: Have been Club owners for 30 years
customer_reviews.text: Have been using the Club for 30 years for each of our vehicles. Always are consciencious to lock up and have never had any problems. Just bought a new car and got a new Club for it, naturally!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Don't steal my stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says! If not anything, it's a great visual deterrent.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product, but just know that if you're using this in a convertible or an open-top Jeep like I do, the red plastic covering the metal will quickly fade to pink. Definitely, not what I had in mind for my red Jeep, so I ended up cutting off the pink plastic. However, that was just lack of forethought on my part. I can't think of many plastics that wouldn't fade in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Darwin E.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: ruber coat finish had a rough seal that damage my steering wheel rubber
customer_reviews.author: MARIO M

product_meta.title: The Club 1000 Original Club Steering Wheel Lock, Red
product_meta.description: Color:RedThe Club 1000 Original Club Steering Wheel Lock is a part of The Club line of quality products by Winner International. The Club is the original, patented vehicle steering wheel lock and the number one selling mechanical anti-theft device for cars and trucks. This product is a strong visual deterrent that alerts a potential thief that your car is protected. On top of that, it's also virtually impossible to defeat as time and effort are a thief's primary restrictions. This product is guaranteed for one year up to $1800.00 against the owner's comprehensive insurance deductible (not valid in New York, Hawaii, Texas, or Wisconsin, where it is prohibited by insurance law). Winner International is committed to providing products to meet everyday safety and security applications. From steering wheel locks to utility and everyday locks, to other safety necessities, the Club brand name guarantees that you are buying peace of mind. Expect a product manufactured for innovative, quality security and safety created by a team you can trust that's dedicated to serving and building safer communities. Why can you expect this? It is Winner International's mission.
feature_bullets: The Club's patented self-locking feature locks with one pull
Solid steel hooks for greater security
Cro-moly steel construction resist sawing, prying,hammering, and freon attacks
Highly visual theft deterrent. Fits steering wheels with inner dimension from 8.75 to 14 inches
Universal fit for cars, light trucks, vans, and SUVs
